idea-plugin.name: Bookmark
idea-plugin.description:
An IntelliJ IDEA plugin for bookmarking selected content from editors and console output. This plugin helps you save and organize important code snippets, console logs, and text selections with labels and notes. Features:
  • Bookmark selected text from editors
  • Bookmark console output content
  • Organize bookmarks with labels and categories
  • View bookmarks sorted by time
  • Tool window to view all bookmarks
  • Navigate to source location
  • Copy bookmark content
  • Delete bookmark items
